gameObject

Class Sonic

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameObject.GameObject
      • gameObject.Unit
        • gameObject.Sonic
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OtherSonic

    public class Sonic
extends Unit
    Represents Sonic, the player of the game

    • Constructor Detail

      • Sonic

        public Sonic()
        The default constructor

      • Sonic

        public Sonic(Camera camera,
             Board board,
             boolean isThisOtherSonic,
             ImageManager imageManager)
        The general constructor used to create Sonic
        Parameters:
        camera - The camera follows Sonic throughout the map
        board - The board (map) for the game
        isThisOtherSonic - Clarifies is the Sonic object is the actual player or another user through multiplayer
        imageManager - A hashmap containing all of the sprite animations
